# sidebar

**Type Property**

The Sidebar menu group.

## Declaration

```swift
static let sidebar: UIMenu.Identifier
```

## Discussion

The Sidebar menu group contains menu elements to show and hide the sidebar.

## View menus

- **toolbar**: The Toolbar menu group.
- **fullscreen**: The Full Screen menu.
title: sidebar
